text:
Has anyone come across these fontconfig errors when building plots via GH actions? Deep down we're using `AbstractPlotting` and `CairoMakie`.
`Fontconfig warning: "/home/runner/.julia/artifacts/69ab5e1318fa87cac480350ccc9faffff3b00c5b/etc/fonts/fonts.conf", line 5: unknown element "its:rules"`
<https://github.com/JuliaDynamics/Agents.jl/pull/398/checks?check_run_id=1801661155>

elements.text: Has anyone come across these fontconfig errors when building plots via GH actions? Deep down we're using

text: Took me a while to identify, but the issue was Cairo asking for fontconfig 2.13 and ubuntu-latest installing 2.12.6. Turns out that GH actions doesn't really mean latest when it says latest, it actually means v18.... One solution therefore is to make documentation in a `ubuntu-20.04` container.
